title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 41 - Sanitary Condition of Shellfish Lands
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 41 - Sanitary Condition of Shellfish Lands

State Regulations
§ 41.0 - Introduction
§ 41.1 - Shellfish lands in Westchester, Rockland, Bronx, Kings, New York, Richmond, and Queens Counties
§ 41.2 - Shellfish lands in Nassau County
§ 41.3 - Shellfish lands in Suffolk County
§ 41.4 - Emergency closing of shellfish lands
§ 41.5 - Temporarily uncertified shellfish lands

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. I, subch. F, pt. 41

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 11-0303, 11-0305, 13-0303, 13-0307, 13-0319

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
